cast.overview: Paul Baumer and his friends Albert and Muller, egged on by romantic dreams of heroism, voluntarily enlist in the German army. Full of excitement and patriotic fervour, the boys enthusiastically march into a war they believe in. But once on the Western Front, they discover the soul-destroying horror of World War I.
cast.title: All Quiet on the Western Front

details.biography: Aaron Hilmer is an actor, known for The Most Beautiful Girl in the World (2018), All Quiet on the Western Front (2022) and The Peppercorns (1999).
details.name: Aaron Hilmer
